text: @CNN @CNN won’t cover @NYGovCuomo’s heartless killing of 6,400 innocent senior citizens because of his brother. @ChrisCuomo won’t even bring the subject of his 3/25/20 order up when he interviews his big brother.  https://t.co/sntBoy8go3
